t: Amazon brings Amazon Clinic, One Medical under a single brand

t: Amazon Brand Analytics: Get data to grow your business

t: Amazon has quietly launched an exclusive line of over-the-counter health products
s: February 22, 2018 - Still, branded products dominated every category except smoking cessation, according to data from Nielsen, meaning there's plenty of room for private-label drugs to grow. Amazon already sells branded OTC medications such as Advil, Mucinex and Nicorette, as well as options from Perrigo's generic ...

t: Understanding Amazon's 'Brand Health' Initiative - Practical Ecommerce
